rdf:Description.dc:title: Mathematics 9 : learning facilitator's manual [man.] 1997 learning facilitator's manual [man.].
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Learning. Learning Technologies Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Text runs parallel to spine for the modules.
Accompanied by 6 Student module booklets [mod.] and Assignment booklets [assgmt.] each with corresponding distinctive title.

Module 1. Operations and number concepts --Module 2. Exponential and scientific notation --Module 3. Equations and inequations --Module 4. Polynomials --Module 5. Measurement and geometry --Module 6. Data management.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Mathematics
Mathematics grade 9.
